long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Weather Page, you can view the current weather in your region in the new tab search & search the web in one convenient place. 

The Weather Page extension offers convenient web search and features from the Chrome New Tab.

The weather info data within the extension is provided by WeatherAPI.

Clock is showing current computer time. (Not the timezone you choose in settings)

Please read carefully: 
By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Weather
Page extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of use (https://weather-page.xyz/tos) and Policy (https://weather-page.xyz/privacy).

You can uninstall the extension at any time.

Terms of use
https://weather-page.xyz/tos

Privacy Policy
https://weather-page.xyz/privacy
 
How to remove our extension from Chrome browser:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
